name: getJobMonitoringInfo
description: Get the job summary for protection and recovery jobs that are currently running, scheduled to run, or completed in the past 24 hours.

limit.description: Maximum number of entries to retrieve. The default value is 25. Value needs to be a positive number.

job_event_status.description: Filters results by the current event status of the job. The filters should be separated by ','.

should_include_log_related_job.description: A Boolean that specifies whether or not to include log- related jobs. Default value is 'false'.

is_first_full.description: Filter results by first full status.

object_type.description: Filters results by a specified object type.

object_name.description: Filters results by the provided value for object_name, using infix search.

effective_sla_domain_id.description: Filters results by the provided sla doimain id.

is_on_demand.description: Filters results according to their on-demand status.

last_update_time.description: All rows updated at or after this time will be returned.

after_id.description: Fetches all rows after given row cursor.

sort_by.description: The column by which to sort the entries.

$ul: **afterId**: Cursor of the last table row sent in the response. Used for setting the cursor when getting the next page of the table.
**effectiveSlaDomainId**: The requested SLA domain id (if applicable).
**hasMore**: A Boolean value that specifies whether or not the list has more elements. This value is 'true' when the list has more elements. This value is 'false' when the list has no more elements.
**isFirstFull**: A Boolean to specify if the jobs are first full backups or not.
**jobEventStatus**: The requested event status of the jobs (if applicable).
**lastUpdateTime**: The earliest possible time at which the latest update to all rows has been made.
**objectType**: Object types that are reported on.
**shouldIncludeLogRelatedJob**: A Boolean to specify whether or not to include log-related jobs.
